DOC.criteria: Patients schedule receive intravitreal injection antivascular endothelial growth factor agent ( either bevacizumab ranibizumab ) , Age 1885 yearold , Initial intraocular pressure < 21 mmHg Diagnosis open angle , Diagnosis angleclosure glaucoma , Diagnosis glaucoma suspect ( intraocular pressure > 21 mmHg 2consecutive visit and/or cup disc ratio > 0.5 ) , Currently receive systemic betablocker Previously receive intravitreal injection antivascular endothelial growth factor agent Previously receive intravitreal injection steroid gancyclovir Current use steroid eye drop Any ocular surface disease preclude reliable intraocular pressure measurement
